textos_fuente.text: Contact Us | Servant Keeper Already using Servant Keeper? Say Yes to the Active Subscription question, and add your Customer ID Say Yes to the Active Subscription question, and add your Account ID It's A Miracle! Close. It's actually great church management software! Over 30,000 churches trust Servant Keeper church software. See how we can save your team hundreds of hours of work. Fill in your info to the right, and someone will get back to you shortly! What's inside Our Easy-To-Use Platform? â Church Management - Streamline membership, contributions, and outreach. Online Giving - Encourage generosity with easier donations. Communications - Connect instantly with your community via text & email. Sites, Apps, & Livestream - Expand your ministryâs reach. Child Check-In - Create a fun, safe place for kids to grow in the Word. Aimee W. Servant Keeper is in touch with churchesâ needs. Contact Us! Interested in a consultation? Fill out this form. Support Phone: (800) 785-3416 Email: support@servantkeeper.com Monday & Friday 10:00 am - 4:00 pm ET Tuesday, Wednesday &Â Thursday 9:00 am - 5:30 pm ET Billing Phone: (800) 773-7570 (Option 2) Email: billing@servantkeeper.com Monday &Â Friday 10:00 am - 4:00 pm ET Tuesday, Wednesday &Â Thursday 9:00 am - 5:00 pm ET Contact Support Now Reports 3 Common Mistakes in Church Capital Campaigns & How to Avoid Them Discover 3 common mistakes in church capital campaigns and how to avoid them with Servant Keeperâs giving, reporting, and dashboard tools. Learn expert tips to enhance storytelling, track progress, and streamline donations for a successful campaign. Children Child Check-in: 5 Must-Dos for Safe & Streamlined Classes Ensure child safety and streamline your church's check-in process with these 5 essential practices. Discover how Servant Keeperâs child check-in software enhances security and creates a welcoming experience for families in your childrenâs ministry. Communication 7 Steps to Better Church Newsletters Discover 7 steps to create engaging church newsletters that connect with your congregation. Learn how to use Servant Keeperâs church app and email tools to keep members informed and inspired. Giving 3 Church Budget Mistakes You May Be Making . . . and How to Avoid Them Discover 3 common church budget mistakes and how to avoid them with Servant Keeperâs expert tips. Learn to create a flexible, transparent budget to boost your ministry in 2025. Website 5 Easy Best Practices for Your Church Website Discover 5 best practices for church websites to attract visitors & engage members with Servant Keeperâs beautiful drag-and-drop builder. 5 Tips for Seamless Church Management Platform Adoption Learn 5 key strategies to successfully transition to a Church Management Platform. Streamline tasks, boost engagement, and manage data effectively. Children 5 child safety policies to make your congregation safer (Part 1) Discover 5 critical child safety policies to protect children in your church. Learn about screening, supervision, and more to ensure a secure environment. Read part 1 now! Giving The Benefits of Recurring Donations Discover how recurring donations boost church financial stability and donor engagement. Learn the benefits of predictable revenue, increased giving, and stronger community ties with Servant Keeperâs all-in-one platform. Giving Analyzing Online Giving For Better Results Discover how to analyze online giving data to increase donations and engagement. Learn key metrics, trends, and tools churches can use to improve digital fundraising results. Children How Child Safety Software Helps Identify Vulnerabilities and Build Trust for Your Congregationâs Summer Programs Ensure child safety and build parent trust in your churchâs summer programs with tools for background checks, secure check-in, staff planning, and parent communication. Giving Engaging the Next Generation: Giving Strategies For Younger Donors Discover proven strategies to increase church giving from Gen Z and Millennials. Learn how digital tools, real-time donation prompts, and impact-focused messaging can inspire generosity from younger donors. Events 3 opportunities to keep your congregation engaged after Easter is over Discover 3 strategies to maintain post-Easter momentum and foster community engagement. Learn how to connect with attendees, personalize communication, and host events to grow your congregation year-round. Giving Take Control of Your Churchâs Budget with Recurring Giving Struggling with inconsistent giving? Discover how recurring giving helps your church create a stable budget, eliminate giving gaps, and free up more time for ministry. Learn more today! Giving Simplify Giving with Custom Forms and QR Codes Learn how Servant Keeper's Online Giving feature makes generosity simple and accessible for your church community. With the ability to create multiple custom giving forms, automatically generated QR codes, and unique links, you can tailor donation pages for tithes, events, or campaigns while providing donors with a seamless giving experience. Discover how this feature enhances clarity, boosts engagement, and streamlines sharing to transform your churchâs giving strategy. Get started today! Accounting Servant Keeper Plus: Your Best Accounting Software Solution Learn why joining powerful church contribution tracking software with industry leading accounting software is the recommended way to manage ministry finances. Case Study: Camarillo United Methodist Church After using the same church software system for 20 years, Camarillo United Methodist Church (CUMC) knew it was time to consider new software. Our Menu previous slide next slide Dot slide navigation number 1 Dot slide navigation number 2 Dot slide navigation number 3 map marker pin 4654 Hwy 6, Sugar Land, TX 77478 About Keeper's Sushi Keeper’s Japanese Restaurant is all about variety. With an ever-expanding menu of delightful sushi as well as kitchen items, there is something for everyone. With over twenty-five years as a sushi chef and two previous restaurants (Kaneyama and Sushi King) under his belt, Exclusive chef Keeper is finally bringing his inventive cuisine to his hometown, Sugar Land. More about us Host Your Private Parties with us! Private parties about the Restaurant Reservations Join us today Click button below to make a reservation Book Now a table Reviews review by - Yelp Ryan H.: THE best sushi takeaway, for every day! Bentos for lunch rolls for dinner; either way it's a winner. My fav is tofu, sansi; thats a pleaser for this guy. review by - Yelp Bushra A.: I'm so glad that we went there, our experience was as wonderful as the service, they took our contactless temperature and since we chose to use paper products they had a different lounge, we really enjoyed the drinks and food. Portion sizes were good and they have a good variety of drinks, sushi bar is amazing, everything was fresh. Hostess was great since it was our first visit we asked her recommendations and didn't get disappointed. Would definitely be back for another great sushi experience. review by - Google Charles O'Brian: Every single visit to Keeper's has been perfect. Each dish was perfectly prepared each time. Quality, presentation and preparation is on point. I cannot say enough about the staff here, specifically Daniel. He has been our server a few times, and his service is impeccable. Happy, friendly and always ready with suggestions and guidance. We will always request him. Overall, the staff seems happy to work here, which tells me quite a bit about the management. I don't give out 5 stars very easily, but Keepers has earned it. review by - Yelp Priscilla Y: I've been coming here since they opened many moons ago! I compare literally ALL sushi places I eat to Keepers. I'm a regular and have nothing but good things to say about it! review by - Yelp Jerica C: Best sushi restaurant in Houston. Everything is always perfect! They have fresh grated wasabi and hamachi Kama so you can't beat it. review by - Yelp Lindsey R: Great happy hour! They have all day happy hour on Saturday and Sunday as well. My must haves are the angry lion, jalapeño age, and the Houston roll. review by - Yelp Truc N: Keepers is the place to go for HH food and drinks in sugarland! I've always received exceptional service and I love the bartender tiffany! She's so genuine and sweet. review by - Yelp Brigitte F: I got the spider roll and it was soooooo good! Highly recommended sushi place! The inside is big as well, plenty of space !. Homepage - Keepersaustin Skip to content MENUS & HOURS INFO RESERVATION GIFT CARDS Mailing List Contact us Menus Dinner Bar Dessert Order On Line Happy Hour available daily 3:00pm-6:30pm Specials Hours Sunday-Wednesday  3pm-9pm Thursday-Saturday 3pm-10pm Happy Hour Daily 3pm-6:30pm Specials Daisy Lounge Reservations Gift Cards Catering Contact us Mailing List Menu & Hours Info Specials 5701 W Slaughter Lane Building D, Austin, Texas 78749 Neve | Powered by WordPress Dinner Menu Sun-Wed 3:00pm-9:00pm Thursday 3:00pm-10:00pm Friday - Saturday 3pm-11pm Bar Menu Dessert Menu Happy Hour Available daily 3:00pm-6:30pm Sunday 3:00pm-close Late Night Friday-Saturdays 10pm-11pm Order On Line Keepers Austin 5701 W Slaughter Lane, Building D Austin, Texas 78749 Keepers Austin Keepers is a cozy neighborhood restaurant in the heart of Circle C in Austin. Our globally inspired dishes feature tacos with house-made heirloom blue corn tortillas, fresh local ingredients and sustainably caught seafood, juicy burgers and steaks and scratch made desserts. Pull up a seat at our raw bar and enjoy a rotating selection of fresh seafood, oysters, and hand rolls. Our white oak wrapped bar serves a thoughtful list of wines, cocktails and beers from Austin’s best local breweries. Our covered patio is not to be missed and hosts an array of tropical plants and cool misting fans inviting you to stay awhile. Join us for brunch, dinner or our daily happy hour. 
 
We look forward to serving you! Chefs Amir & Ali Hajimaleki Catering Inquiries Reservations Visit our Sister Restaurants Subscribe to Our Mailing List Name Email Subscribe You can unsubscribe at anytime Specials Monday - 1/2 price Bottle Night Tuesday- All Day HH for Teachers Wednesday- $2  off Liquor of the Month Thursday- Pint & Po'boy Special Saturday- Buckets & Boils Teachers and Veterans Teachers - 15% off Entree (with valid ID) Veterans - 20% off Entree (with Valid ID)

About Us | Keeper's Heart Whiskey Keeper’s Heart About Us Our Whiskey Irish + American Irish + American 110 Proof Irish + Bourbon Irish + Bourbon Cask Strength 10 Year Irish Single Malt 21 Year Irish Single Malt Single Barrels Our Process Drinks Cask Society News Shop Buy Whiskey Find Near You Personalized Labels Merch Store Corporate Gifting Visit Facebook X Instagram YouTube About Us A NEW STYLE OF WHISKEY Discover a new taste experience with our award-winning whiskey that brings together the rich heritage of Irish and American whiskey-making traditions. This new to world style brings together the smoothness and richness of Irish whiskey with the boldness and complexity of American whiskey, creating a unique drinking experience like no other. Enjoy it neat, on the rocks, or in cocktails, and savor the perfect balance of flavors in every sip. Expertly Crafted A marriage made in whiskey heaven. World renowned Master Distiller, Brian Nation, hailing from Ireland, and best known for his work with Irish distillers on iconic whiskey brands such as Jameson, Redbreast, and Midleton has collaborated with the wizard of American whiskey and founder of High West Distillery, David Perkins to bring together the best of Irish and American whiskey-making traditions. Their combined experience, passion, and knowledge has allowed them to create a new whiskey that seamlessly fuses the best of both worlds, that whiskey lovers around the world can enjoy. MOST AWARDED NEW WHISKEY Since launching, Keeper’s Heart Whiskey has earned 150 awards and accolades across leading whiskey competitions including, World's Best Irish Whiskey at the 2023 San Francisco World Spirits Competition, “Best Whiskey in a Highball,” at the World Cocktail Championships by the Beverage Testing Institute, Platinum at the Critics Challenge International Spirits Competition, Triple Gold at the MicroLiquor Spirit Awards, and a 96 points and a Platinum at the Las Vegas Global Spirits Awards. Fugit Hora Celebrate the Moments Worth Keeping Savor the company of loved ones with every sip of Keeper’s Heart whiskey, crafted to unlock the best of times. Founded by cousins Patrick & Michael O'Shaughnessy, the O'Shaughnessy family motto, "Fugit Hora" or "The Hour Flies," reminds us to cherish every moment spent with those closest to us. Whether it's a special occasion or a casual gathering, our whiskeys are the perfect addition to any celebration. So raise a glass and enjoy the fleeting moments - because before you know it, the hour flies. Our Home Destined to put Minnesota on the World Whiskey Map, O’Shaughnessy Distilling Co. dedicates more than 15,000 square feet entirely to the whiskey making process, including our signature component: three wondrous copper pot stills. The remainder of the distillery consists of our Restaurant & Bar, featuring unique shared spaces for people to come together and enjoy our delicious food and signature cocktails. OUR LOGO Every element of our logo was carefully considered to tell a part of our story. 01 KEEPER’S Represents our desire to cherish the important elements of life: loved ones, time, traditions. It is also our tip of the cap to that community whose mission is to serve: the world’s barkeepers. 02 THE HEART Everything we do comes from the heart, with passion and honesty. We also always carefully select the heart of the distillation. 03 THE CLOCK Represents the specialness of time spent together and a reminder from the family to enjoy every moment. Fugit Hora, The Hour Flies , is our family motto and reminder to slow down and enjoy every moment. 04 THE KEYS Your invitation from the family to join ours. We look forward to unlocking experiences together. 05 THE KEEP Traditionally every castle has a Keep—the innermost sanctum where the family’s most prized possessions are kept. Our Keep represents the specialness of the liquid created by Master Distiller Brian Nation.
